         <use xlink:href="#icon-arrow">
         </use>
        </svg>
        <ul class="niveau2">
         <li>

     <div class="clear">
     </div>
    </div>
    <p class="footer-content">
     Nestled between two rivers  the River Elle and the River Vire (which gave their names to our brand)  in the heart of Normandy, the Cond-sur-Vire dairy has built the success of the Elle &amp; Vire for over 70 years.
     <br/>
     The Elle &amp; Vire brand has pioneered in many technological fields, enabling it to launch a host of innovations (such as UHT sterilised milk, UHT sterilised cream, dairy desserts and UHT dessert creams, soft butter, etc.) that have revolutionised everyday life both for consumers and professional users. Drawing on its Normandy know-how, Elle &amp; Vire can truly claim to epitomise French quality, both among consumers and chefs in more than 120 countries around the world.
    </p>
   </div>
  </div>

  <script>
   (function(w, ua) {
            w.F = w.F || {};
            w.F.CONFIG = {
                BASE_URL : "",
                BASE_PATH : "",
                FB_URL : "https://connect.facebook.net/fr_FR/all.js",                FB_APPID : "666626543355232",
                REGISTER_URL : "/en/registration/",
                LOGIN_URL : "/en/login/",
                PASSWORD_URL : "/en/forgot-password/",
                BIRTHDAY_URL : "/en/popin-birthday/",
                NEWSLETTER1_URL : "/en/popin-newsletter1-en/",
                NEWSLETTER2_URL : "/en/popin-newsletter2-en/",
                PROFILE_URL : "/en/popin-profile/",
                LANG : "en",
                MARKET : "3"
            };
            w.F._ = {
                wW : w.innerWidth,
                wH : w.innerHeight || document.documentElement.offsetHeight,
                scrollTop : 0,
                userLogged : 0
            };

            var iOSVersion = false;
            if (/iP(hone|od|ad)/.test(navigator.platform)) {
                var v = (navigator.appVersion).match(/OS (\d+)_(\d+)_?(\d+)?/);
                iOSVersion = parseInt(v[1], 10);
            }

            F.isAndroid = ua.indexOf("android") > -1;
            F.isLtIOS8 = iOSVersion && iOSVersion < 8;
        })(window, navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase());

        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        window.dataLayer.push({
           'etatConnexion': "Non loggu"
        });
  </script>
  <script src="/assets/js/app.min.js">
  </script>
  <!--[if lt IE 8]>
    <script>
        window.location.href="/en/internet-explorer-en/";
    </script>
    <![endif]-->
  <script>
   var geoloc = "inter";
        var territory = "inter";
        var showgeoloc = "";

        if (showgeoloc) {
            if ($('#header-home').length > 0) {
                F.selectGeolocHeader.openSubmenu($('#header-home'));
            } else {
                F.selectGeolocHeader.openSubmenu($('#header'));
            }

        }
  </script>
  <script>
   $('body').one('mouseleave', function() {
            new F.UI.Popin().newsletter2();
        });
  </script>
  <script>
   var geoloc = "inter";
        var territory = "inter";
        var showgeoloc = "";

        if (showgeoloc) {
            F.selectGeolocHeader.closeSubmenu($('#header'));
            F.selectGeolocHeader.openSubmenu($('#header-home'));
        }

        F.headerHome = new F.UI.HeaderHome($('#header-home'));
        F.news = new F.UI.HeaderNews($('.articles'));

        setInterval(function() {
            $('#gagnaire, #michalak').toggleClass('out');
        }, 5000);
  </script>
